title: New: IYES – Glow
content:
There’s a fine line between exploiting a catchy melody and riding it, a difference between shoving a hook in a face to offering it.

The new track from ‘CitR bro/sis 4 lyf’, IYES, toes this line to perfection in their new track GLOW. Like in their debut track, lighthouse, the track features several eruptions that manage to hit he spot EVERY FUCKING TIME.

2nd March 2013 – The Shacklewell Arms, Dalston, London.
26th March 2013 – Village Underground w/WAVE MACHINES, Shoreditch, London.

Hit play below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
